divs: sighting detailsit was 9pm and i was driving when i saw the first couple of lights. i stopped my car and called my husband to go see it on the balcony. i then saw more red\orange lights that looked like chinese lanterns,or stars, but bigger. they were moving slowly almost like hovering. they were ascending on a northeast direction.they were all formed in a geometrical shape like a triangle. it lasted about 4 to 5 minutes and then they disappeared. my husband saw the same thing from the balcony.
Summary: red/orange lights resembled chinese lanterns about 9 of them ascending in a geometrical shape almost like a triangle then disappeared. They moved slowly almost like hovering.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There was one other sighting in San Diego on or around February 17th 2013
